title: Lagging in RANKED
body: Every time I play ranked I have MS of over 170, but when I play normal my MS is perfectly normal (45-50). Riot Ranked servers laggy or something today?

replies.body:
Is this still occurring? If so, I'd recommend giving your modem/router a quick reboot (unplug power from it for 30 seconds) in case your modem was contributing some weird routing.

Let me know if this happens again.
My lag problem is happening again. My computer is the only one connected to the internet after resetting everything. Please help

In this case, there may be some issues between your PC and our servers caused by network routing. I'd like you to run a traceroute log using [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/) during a time you experience the symptoms. After loading up the app, simply paste **104.160.131.1** into the host field and start the trace. After 5 minutes has gone by, you can export the trace results as text and then paste them in a reply.

Let me know if you run into any issues with this.

It looks like your latency issues start within your own network, where your PC experiences a latency spike of **116ms** to your own modem. Your latency then continues to spike in the high 100s before reaching our servers. I suspect there may be something up with your modem, but I'd recommend reaching out to your ISP's tier 2 support with this traceroute so they can investigate.

If you have any other questions, please let me know!
